name: Kahala's Shrimp and Broccoli Toss
author: Kahala
summary: Very pretty pasta toss with baby shrimp and bright green broccoli florets nestled in a light yet buttery sauce and served tossed with your favorite pasta.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package uncooked angel hair pasta
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
directions: Bring a pot of water to a boil, and cook the broccoli 5 minutes, just until tender
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add angel hair pasta, cook for 4 minutes, until al dente, and drain
Heat the margarine and olive oil in a skillet, and cook the onion and garlic until tender
Mix in broccoli and shrimp, and cook until heated through
Toss with the cooked pasta, season with salt and pepper, and top with cheese to serve
